response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. This exceptional item is valued at $800,000 by you, and it holds even greater significance for me, being worth over $1,500,000 to me personally. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic value, making it a compelling proposition for both of us. I trust that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1200000}
